description: Unified mdfx registry - single source of truth for all renderables, styles, and configuration

tech-group.description: Group of badges (tech, version, license) with automatic corner handling. All params are inherited by child badges unless overridden.

gap.description: Gap between badges in pixels (group-only, not inherited)

live.description: Live data badges from external APIs (GitHub, npm, crates.io, PyPI)

source.description: Data source: github (stars/forks/issues), npm (version/license), crates (version/downloads), pypi (version/license/python)

metric.description: Metric to display (source-specific, defaults to version/stars)

bg.description: Background color (auto-selected based on source if not specified)

row.description: Horizontal row of badges with alignment control. Wraps in HTML for GitHub compatibility.

progress.description: Progress bar with customizable track and fill colors/heights

fill_height.description: Fill height in pixels (can be less than track for floating effect)

border_width.description: Border width in pixels (when border is set)

thumb.description: Thumb height in pixels (enables slider mode when set)

thumb_width.description: Thumb width in pixels (defaults to thumb height for circle/square)

thumb_shape.description: Thumb shape: circle, square, or diamond

thumb.description: Thumb size in pixels (enables slider mode)

size.description: Width in pixels (height is approximately half)

thumb.description: Thumb size in pixels (enables slider mode)

sparkline.description: Mini inline chart for data visualization

type.description: Chart type: line, bar, or area

dots.description: Show dots at data points (line type only)

rating.description: Star/heart/circle rating display with partial fill support

size.description: Size of each icon in pixels

icon.description: Icon type: star, heart, or circle

waveform.description: Audio-style waveform visualization with bars above/below center

positive.description: Color for bars above zero (alias: up)

negative.description: Color for bars below zero (alias: down)

bar_width.description: Width of each bar in pixels (alias: bar)

version.description: Version badge with semver-aware coloring (green=stable, yellow=beta, orange=alpha, red=deprecated)

status.description: Override auto-detected status (auto-detected from version string if not specified)

license.description: License badge with category-aware coloring (green=permissive, blue=weak-copyleft, yellow=copyleft, gray=proprietary)

gradient.description: Gradient blocks from bold to light

finger.description: Right and left pointing index fingers

mathbold.name: Mathematical Bold
mathbold.description: Bold serif letters for professional emphasis

negative-squared.name: Negative Squared
negative-squared.description: White letters on black squares for maximum contrast

negative-circled.name: Negative Circled
negative-circled.description: White letters on black circles for bold, rounded emphasis

small-caps.name: Small Caps
small-caps.unicode_block: Latin Extended Additional (U+1D00â€“U+1D7F) and IPA Extensions

bold-italic.name: Bold Italic
bold-italic.description: Combined bold and italic for strong emphasis with flow

sans-serif-bold-italic.name: Sans-Serif Bold Italic
sans-serif-bold-italic.description: Bold and slanted sans-serif for maximum emphasis

subscript.name: Subscript
subscript.description: Small lowered text for chemical formulas and math (Hâ‚‚O, xâ‚)

superscript.name: Superscript
superscript.description: Small raised text for exponents and ordinals (xÂ², 1Ë¢áµ—)

parenthesized.name: Parenthesized
parenthesized.description: Letters enclosed in parentheses for lists and annotations

inverted.name: Inverted
inverted.description: Upside-down text for playful effects (read bottom to top)

strikethrough.name: Strikethrough
strikethrough.description: Crossed-out text using combining long stroke overlay (U+0336)
